channel.title: Guns missing from inventory!
channel.description: When I started Surface tension, guns started to disappear from my inventory. Now all I have left is the starter pistol and the crowbar. Has this happened to anyone else? Update: now the pistol is always facing downwards, as if I was pointing it at an NPC in HL2.

item.title: Guns missing from inventory!
item.dc:creator: Jerkothanster
item.description:
Well, here you are anyways…

item.title: Guns missing from inventory!
item.dc:creator: Jerkothanster
item.description:
cman2k:

If any of you can post a save file that 100% reproduces this issue, that would be really valuable! Thanks for the post, we’ve never seen this one before.

I’ll trade you a save file for whatever the console code is to get the tau cannon.

Read full topic

item.title: Guns missing from inventory!
item.dc:creator: PlausibleSarge
item.description:
I had a similar problem, which was 100% reproducible, when going from the first map of surface tension to the last map of questionable ethics. It would take away my tau, shotgun, mp5 and crossbow

Read full topic

item.title: Guns missing from inventory!
item.dc:creator: The_MAZZTer
item.description:
Quick/Auto saves delete themselves, but saves you explicitly make shouldn’t…

Read full topic

item.title: Guns missing from inventory!
item.dc:creator: Jerkothanster
item.description:
It’s no good, now saves are mysteriously deleting themselves and my telsa gun is permanently gone from my inventory. I might not be able to continue the game from this point… Does anyone know some console code I could use just to get it back?

Read full topic

item.title: Guns missing from inventory!
item.dc:creator: Jerkothanster
item.description:
I’ll start again from a quick save then and see if that helps.

Read full topic

item.title: Guns missing from inventory!
item.dc:creator: Mad1
item.description:
Yep it happened to me. I restarted from the previous level and they appeared again. I’m using the manual save a lot as it appear that the Autosave isn’t always working.

Read full topic
